authChoiceFindUser: Choice used for searching user account
author: Author
badChoiceKey: Bad key name in Choice menu
badExpressionAssignment: Expression containing an assignment. You can use \x3D to avoid this warning.
browsersDontStorePassword: Avoid browsers to store users password
captcha_mail_enabled: Activation in password reset by mail form
checkEntropyRequiredLevel: Minimal entropy level for password to be accepted
complexnode: This setting cannot be displayed here, open it separately from the menu
confModuledeprecated: This module has been deprecated, set "forceUpload=1" in lemonldap-ng.ini to use it
dbiDynamicHashNewPasswordScheme: Dynamic hash scheme for new passwords
doubleCookieForSingleSession: Double cookie for a single session
forbidden: You're not authorized to show this page
impersonationMergeSSOgroups: Merge spoofed and real SSO groups
label: Label
ldapAllowResetExpiredPassword: Allow to reset an expired password
ldapGetUserBeforePasswordChange: Search for user before password change
mailOnPasswordChange: Send a mail when password is changed
mailTimeout: Validity time of a password reset request
name: Name
needConfirmation: Confirmation required. To force the update, click on the check box near the 'save' button
newCfgAvailableWarning: Configuration was changed by someone else since you started editing it. By forcing this update you will lose their changes.
newLocationWarningMaxValues: Maximum number of locations to consider
notificationDeleted: Notification has been marked as done
notificationNotDeleted: The notification was not marked as done
notificationNotPurged: The notification was not definitely removed
oidcDropCspHeaders: Drop CSP headers from OIDC responses
oidcOPMetaDataOptionsAuthnEndpointAuthMe: Authentication method for authorization code request
oidcOPMetaDataOptionsAuthnEndpointAuthSi: Signature algorithm for authorization code authentication
oidcRPMetaDataOptionsAccessTokenEncConte: Access Token Encryption content encryption algorithm
oidcRPMetaDataOptionsAccessTokenEncKeyMg: Access Token Encryption key management alg
oidcRPMetaDataOptionsAccessTokenJWT: Use JWT format for Access Token
oidcRPMetaDataOptionsAllowNativeSso: Allow Native SSO for Mobile App
oidcRPMetaDataOptionsIDTokenForceClaims: Force claims to be returned in ID Token
oidcRPMetaDataOptionsIdTokenEncContentEn: ID Token Encryption content encryption algorithm
oidcRPMetaDataOptionsIdTokenEncKeyMgtAlg: ID Token Encryption key management alg
oidcRPMetaDataOptionsRequestUris: Allowed URLs for fetching Request Object
oidcRPMetaDataOptionsTokenXAuthorizedRP: Other RP allowed to exchange access_token
oidcRPMetaDataOptionsUserinfoRequireHead: Userinfo endpoint authentication using header only
pickFontAwesome: or input the code of a Font Awesome icon
portalErrorOnMailNotFound: Show error on mail not found
registerTimeout: Validity time of a register request
samlOverrideIDPEntityID: Override Entity ID when acting as IDP
samlSPMetaDataOptionsEnableIDPInitiatedU: Enable use of IDP initiated URL
sfRemovedMsg: Display a message if an expired 2FA is removed
sfRemovedNotification: Warn if an expired 2FA is removed
subtitle: Subtitle
title: Title
userPivot: Login field name in user table
waitOrF5: Wait for redirection or press F5
yubikey2fFromSessionAttribute: Get Yubikey ID from session attribute
zeroConfExplanations: Server has no configuration. Use template to save the first.
